text: Luis José de Orbegoso y Moncada-Galindo, de Burutarán y Morales (August 25, 1795 – February 5, 1847), was an aristocratic Peruvian soldier and politician, who served as the 5th President of Peru as well as the first President of North Peru. This was a time of profound social instability and continuing civil war. ==References== Category:Peruvian politicians Category:1795 births Category:1847 deaths
title: Luis José de Orbegoso
